functional_jobs.job_statement: When I am new to Santa Barbara, I want to connect with other newcomers, so I can build a social network in my new environment.
functional_jobs.current_solution: Joining Santa Barbara newcomers and exploring events through the app.
functional_jobs.pain_points: Overwhelmed by the number of clubs and committees; difficulty finding relevant information on the website.
functional_jobs.desired_outcomes: Easily identify and join groups that match my interests.
functional_jobs.success_criteria: Successfully connect with other newcomers and participate in events that align with my interests.

functional_jobs.job_statement: When I want to register for events, I want a seamless experience, so I can easily join without frustration.
functional_jobs.current_solution: Using the app to register for events.
functional_jobs.pain_points: Website is confusing and not user-friendly; reliance on the app due to dissatisfaction with the website.
functional_jobs.desired_outcomes: A more intuitive registration process that encourages engagement.
functional_jobs.success_criteria: Easily register for events without confusion or technical issues.

emotional_jobs.job_statement: When I explore the newcomers' website, I want to feel excited and welcomed, so I can feel comfortable joining and participating.
emotional_jobs.pain_points: Website feels dated and uninviting; does not evoke excitement.
emotional_jobs.desired_outcomes: An engaging and visually appealing website that makes me feel valued.
emotional_jobs.success_criteria: Feel motivated to explore and participate in events based on the website’s design and content.

social_jobs.job_statement: When I participate in newcomers' events, I want to be perceived as an engaged and friendly member, so I can build a positive reputation within the community.
social_jobs.current_solution: Joining and attending events organized by Santa Barbara newcomers.
social_jobs.pain_points: Difficulty in finding relevant events makes it challenging to engage meaningfully.
social_jobs.desired_outcomes: Establish a reputation as an active and sociable newcomer.
social_jobs.success_criteria: Gain recognition among peers as an active participant in community events.

supporting_jobs.job_statement: When I want to gather information about the newcomers' activities, I want it to be easily accessible, so I can make informed decisions about my participation.
supporting_jobs.current_solution: Using the app and occasionally checking the website.
supporting_jobs.pain_points: Information is scattered and hard to find; the website lacks a clear structure.
supporting_jobs.desired_outcomes: Centralized and organized information about events and committees.
supporting_jobs.success_criteria: Quickly find and understand information regarding activities and how to participate.
